Title: Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG project to export its first LNG cargo today: Mauritania
Description: The BP-operated 2.5 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG project offshore Mauritania and Senegal is set to export its first LNG cargo today, debuting both countries as global LNG exporters, according to Mauritaniaâ€™s energy minister Mohamed Ould Khaled.
